Package infodynamics.measures.discrete

Interface Summary
ChannelCalculator An interface for calculators computing measures from a source to a destination.
SingleAgentMeasure Interface to define adding observations and calculating local and average values of info theoretic measures for single agent metrics (e.g.
 

Class Summary
ActiveInformationCalculator Usage: 1.
ApparentTransferEntropyCalculator Implements transfer entropy (see Schreiber, PRL, 2000) and local transfer entropy (see Lizier et al, PRE, 2008).
BlockEntropyCalculator Computes entropy over blocks of consecutive states in time.
CombinedActiveEntRateCalculator A combined calculator for the active information, entropy rate and entropy.
CompleteTransferEntropyCalculator Implements complete transfer entropy, and local complete transfer entropy (see Lizier et al, PRE, 2008).
ConditionalMutualInformationCalculator Implements conditional mutual information Usage: 1.
ContextOfPastMeasureCalculator  
EntropyCalculator Univariate entropy calculator
EntropyRateCalculator Compute average and local entropy rates Usage: 1.
InfoMeasureCalculator Info theoretic measure calculator base class, providing common functionality for user-level measure classes.
MultiInformationCalculator Usage: 1.
MutualInformationCalculator Usage: 1.
SeparableInfoCalculator Implements separable information (see Lizier et al, Chaos 2010) Separable information = sum of active information and apparent transfer entropy from every causal information contributor.
SeparableInfoCalculatorByAddition  
SingleAgentMeasureInContextOfPastCalculator Combines functionality for single agents with functionality required in the context of the past.
